external_references.description: Stepanic, D.. (2020, January 13). Embracing offensive tooling: Building detections against Koadic using EQL. Retrieved November 30, 2020.

description: Monitor for processes that can be used to enumerate domain accounts and groups, such as net.exe and net1.exe, especially when executed in quick succession.(Citation: Elastic - Koadiac Detection with EQL)   Information may also be acquired through Windows system management tools such as Windows Management Instrumentation and PowerShell.
